Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: CHRISTINA JETER
Reviews.Content: Came in on time works great second one I bought as family loved it.  Accessories were great to come with it the bottle broke open but because of the well handled packaging it did not bother the rest of the items

ProductInfo.Features:
20.1MP 1/2.3" Super HAD CCD Sensor
Sony 26x Optical Zoom Lens
35mm Equivalent Focal Length: 22.3-580mm
3.0" 460k-Dot Clear Photo LCD Monitor
HD 720p Video at 30fps
Optical SteadyShot Image Stabilization
Picture and Beauty Effect
360° Sweep Panorama
Face Detection and Smile Shutter
Uses AA Batteries
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H200 Digital Camera 8GB Package 1
